first you MUST install the original HOI2 doomsday (maybe with at least 1.02 patch), othewise you'll get this massage

How do I install.Cannot with Daemontools

This is just an expansion pack. First install HoI 2. Here is a torrent to HoI 2 DD
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/3575716/Hearts_of_Iron_2_Doomsday
This expansion adds few scenarios, extends time line and fixes a few bugs.
